data.title: The Silver Shine - Saint or Sinner - LP RELEASE
data.teaser:
Vinyl is a Collector's thing and to bring the great album of The Silver Shine out on LP we need your help to raise money for the production costs! Support the scene

This project comes to you by Longneck Records in thankful cooperation with "Us surrender? Aw nuts!" - Records
answers:
For who is this project?
To all listeners of independent music and all Fans of The Silver Shine
It is good music and we need to help keep it going
It is taken to pay the factory to produce this record
Longneck Records, "Us surrender? - Aw nuts"! - Records
